Annual State bank data comes from Millenial Statistics, Cj151, State banks, Loans and discounts. It was made quarterly by linear interpolation. The state and national bank numbers were added together and used to interpolate the Millenial statistics annual number. This let us interpolate from 1896 to 1913. Then we attached the series for state and national banks, discounting by the ratio for that series to the Millenial series in 1914. This gave us a series from 1882 to 1955.
